data.text: Staying at this hotel was a truly special experience for me, surrounded by staff brimming with hospitality every day, making my daily life feel as happy as if I were at home. I was exceptionally well cared for, especially by the Room Manager Hala, the Receptionists Claudine and Harendra, Salleem in the restaurant with his delicious Turkish coffee, Susette at the Cafe, and the IT Assistant Mohamed Thowfeq. I would like to express my gratitude by naming them specifically, but it wasn't just these individuals; everyone made my stay exceptionally pleasant.
data.title: A Heartfelt Thanks to the Exceptional Team That Made My Stay Unforgettable

data.text: Now we are in this hotel.the water is Reilly cold for showering.we told to the reception and he told us that he can‚Äôt do anything.the breakfast is awful .everyday you have to eat something which is not eatable .I never and ever come back to this hotel again.
data.title: Awful hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your recent stay at our hotel. We appreciate your honesty and value your opinion. We are disappointed to hear about the issues you encountered during your stay, particularly regarding the cold water for showering and the quality of our breakfast.

We strive to provide a comfortable and enjoyable experience for all our guests, and we sincerely apologize for falling short of your expectations. Our team takes guest feedback seriously, and we would like to gather more details about your experience to address the issues you mentioned appropriately.

If possible, could you please provide us with more specific information about the dates of your stay, the room number, and any interactions you had with our staff regarding the water temperature and breakfast? This will help us investigate the matter thoroughly and take the necessary steps to improve our services.

We want to  assure you that your feedback will not go unnoticed. We genuinely value your patronage and would appreciate the opportunity to make it right. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely,
Claudine Rey-Hipolito
Assistant Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Priyanka Virdikar

data.text: The best experience ever!!! The room was amazing and the staff friendly and kind!!!! The location is perfect! Adil and Mehmel was the best team always waiting to welcome us with a smile ! We enjoyed this so much and we felt like home!! ‚ô•Ô∏èThank you for everything
data.title: We loved our stay! Best experience ever! ü´∂üèº

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Coastal44205150344,

We are thrilled to read your review and learn that you had the best experience ever during your stay with us. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.

We are delighted to know that you found the room amazing. Providing comfortable and well-appointed accommodations is important to us, and we are thrilled that we met your expectations in this regard.

Furthermore, we are overjoyed to hear that our staff, particularly Adil and Mehmel, made your stay even more memorable. We will be sure to pass along your kind words to them. They will be delighted to know that their friendly and kind service made a positive impact on your stay.

Our location is indeed one of our most treasured assets, and we are glad you found it perfect. Being in a prime location allows our guests to easily explore the surrounding attractions and enjoy their time to the fullest.

Lastly, we are delighted that you felt at home during your stay. It is our aim to create a welcoming and comfortable environment for all our guests, and we are thrilled that we succeeded in doing so for you.

Thank you once again for choosing our hotel and for your kind words. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for another exceptional experience in the future.

Warm regards,
Priyanka Virdikar
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Priyanka Virdikar

data.text:
Thank you to the tour operator Jibran Farid from travel saga tourism 

He certainly went the extra mile from booking an amazing tour day which ended at the breathtaking Sheikh Zayed Mosque.

Everything was done professionally and with ease 

The tour was enjoyable, Jibran Farid also recommended that if there was any problem with transportation or services to Watsapp immediately for assistance, 

Will definitely book again with him when I return to Dubai 

Best recommendations, pleasant and reliable service 
Thank you so much ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
5/5 stars
data.title: Tour operator

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with Jibran Farid from Travel Saga Tourism in your online review. We greatly appreciate your kind words and are thrilled to hear about the exceptional service you received during your tour.

We are delighted that Jibran went the extra mile to ensure your day tour was amazing and that it concluded with a breathtaking visit to the Sheikh Zayed Mosque. It's fantastic to know that everything was handled professionally and with ease, providing you with a seamless and enjoyable experience.

We are pleased to hear that Jibran also offered assistance via WhatsApp in case of any transportation or service-related issues. It is our commitment to our guests' satisfaction, and we are glad that Jibran provided such proactive and attentive support.

Your feedback is truly valuable to us, and we will make sure to recognize Jibran for his outstanding service. We are confident that he will be thrilled to know that you will definitely book with him again when you return to Dubai.

Thank you for choosing our hotel, and we look forward to serving you again on your next visit to Dubai.

Sincerely,
Claudine Rey-Hipolito
Assistant Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Priyanka Virdikar

data.text:
Iam extremely satisfied with the personalized service I received during my stay at this hotel. The welcome was exceptional, and the speed with which my requests were handled really impressed me. The responsiveness of the staff was remarkable, and I would particularly like to thank David for his invaluable help in resolving a lost luggage issue during my trip to India. His professionalism and dedication truly made a difference and contributed to making my stay even more enjoyable. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for quality service and personalized attention.

A warm thank you also to Mahmoud for his responsiveness and the comfort provided, to Khan and Singh from the front desk, to Elias from the valet service, as well as to Gerald from the security service, whose dedication to the guests is admirable and deserves to be highlighted. Thanks to the entire team for making my hotel experience exceptional.
data.title: Excellent service, personalized and responsiveness . Highly recommended !

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share such a heartfelt and positive review of your recent stay at our hotel. We are absolutely thrilled to hear that you were extremely satisfied with the personalized service you received during your time with us.

It brings us great joy to know that our team provided you with an exceptional welcome and promptly handled your requests with impressive speed. We are especially delighted that David went above and beyond to assist you in resolving a lost luggage issue during your trip to India. We will make sure to recognize David for his professionalism, dedication, and invaluable help.

We are honored that you highly recommend our hotel to others seeking quality service and personalized attention. Your kind words about our staff members, including Mahmoud for his responsiveness and comfort provided, Khan and Singh from the front desk, Elias from the valet service, and Gerald from the security service, are truly appreciated. We will ensure that they are recognized for their outstanding dedication to our guests.

Your satisfaction and enjoyment are our utmost priorities, and we are delighted that our team's efforts contributed to making your stay exceptional. We will share your feedback with the entire team to motivate and inspire them to continue delivering exceptional service.

Thank you once again for choosing our hotel and for your kind words of appreciation. We would be honored to welcome you back for another outstanding experience in the future.

Sincerely,
Claudine Rey-Hipolito
Assistant Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Priyanka Virdikar
